import { useState } from "react"; import axios from "axios"; function AdminProduct() { const [image, setImage] = useState(false); const [productDetails, setProductDetails] = useState({ name:"", image:"", category:"men", description:"", new_price:"", old_price:"", }) const [err, setErr] = useState(false); const changeHandler = (e) => { setProductDetails({ ...productDetails, [e.target.name]:e.target.value }) } console.log(productDetails) const handleClick = async () => { try{ await axios.post("http://localhost:4000/addproduct", productDetails) } catch(err){ setErr(err) console.log(err) } } return (

Ajouter un produit

) } export default AdminProduct
